thread.title: Mother is gifted the body of her dreams by her husband
thread.title_full: Mother is gifted the body of her dreams by her husband

title: Mother is gifted the body of her dreams by her husband
text: Mother left with 'sagging granny skin' after losing 150lbs is gifted her dream body after her husband treats her to a $9,000 tummy tuck and breast implants Donna Clayton, 33, from St Joseph in Missouri, USA, reached 260lbs After gastric bypass three years ago, the mother lost nearly 150lbs (11st) Donna was horrified after she was left with what she called 'sagging granny skin' She was so embarrassed that she refused to be naked in front of husband David He paid $9,000 (Â£7,000) for a combined tummy tuck, breast lift and implants She says she feels more confident than ever and loves wearing a bikini
